'''''Swords of the Gorge''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]]s Cortana and Mergleis, Swords of the Gorge.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Swords of the Gorge, Cortana and Murgleis, can be found located west of [[Thalatta Submarine Canyon]].
<gallery>
Achievement Swords of the Gorge Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Swords of the Gorge Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* The names of Cortana and Murgleis are both derived from legendary swords in the medieval literary cycle of the {{w|Matter of France}}. {{w|Cortain|Cortana}} is a sword owned by {{w|Ogier the Dane}}, a legendary paladin of Charlemagne. Meanwhile, {{w|Murgleys|Murgleis}} is a sword owned by {{w|Ganelon}}, a knight who betrays Charlemagne's army.
